msContents.summary: Christian writing by Melito of Sardis known as De Prophetia written 150-180 in Sardis, Asia

objectDesc.p: Papyrus, 12x11.4 (?), 1 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 16 (?) line(s) per column, 18-20 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: Excavated 1896-1897 by Bernard Grenfell and Arthur Hunt, Egypt Exploration Society at Al Bahnasā, Miṣr from a garbage dump.
Donated pre 1904 to University of Oxford, Bodleian Library at Oxford, England.

msIdentifier.msName: MS. Gr. th. f. 9, University of Oxford, Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.

sourceDesc.bibl: Grenfell, Bernard P. and Arthur S. Hunt, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri, vol. 1, no. 5, Egypt Exploration Society: London, England, 1898. OCLC 855777953.
